name: Planet Attraction
description:
This game was made in 3 hours. Make sure to read the rest of the description.

You have to protect an idiotic green metal ball from the smarter red balls by dragging a big grey planet that is also a magnet.

How to play.

Drag the grey planet with your mouse to move It.

Since the grey planet is also a magnet, It can attract metal(such as the green ball).

Avoid the red balls(since they are smart, sharp, and tough).

Play for a while and you will become good at the game(Hopefully).

If you read all of this, good for you. Now go play the game.
